response:

* give you angry looks - beautiful (because it means they care about what's bothering me)

* say things to scare you - gross
* make you do something embarrassing - gross
* encourage you to open up - beautiful
* open to your ideas - beautiful
* excited to see you - beautiful
* listen attentively to you - beautiful
* make an effort with your family - beautiful
